page.title: 08Notable Events
page.content: Some of the notable events happening in Rainford are walking day,fun run, half marathon,school gala day and Civic Sunday. Walking day happens some time in June at approximately 2.00PM.All of the village organisations walk through the village.It is an exciting family occasion. The fun run costs Â£2.00 if you post the money or Â£2.50 on the day.The route is from the Golden Lion Public House to Higher Lane and then up to the Wheatsheaf and then down the By- pass and back to the Golden Lion.You get a medal for finishing.Two people from school finished even though exhausted. At the Gala Day there are a lot of games and side shows.This year it was a tremendous occasion,blessed by good weather.
